text: Joe Balyeat (born October 26, 1956) is a former member of the Montana Legislature. Balyeat was elected as a Republican to Senate District 34, representing Bozeman, Montana, in 2004. Previously, Balyeat served two terms in the Montana House. Balyeat resigned his Senate Seat in June 2012 to take on the Montana State Director role with Americans for Prosperity. He would have been ineligible to run for re-election due to Montana's term limits. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1956 births Category:Montana Republicans Category:Montana state senators Category:Politicians from Great Falls, Montana Category:Members of the Montana House of Representatives
title: Joe Balyeat
